name: Takeoff from East Midlands (EMA) - Thomson Airways Boeing 767-300
description:
Departure from East Midlands Airport (EMA) runway 27 onboard Thomson Airways Boeing 767-300 operating flight TOM374 to Orlando Sanford, Florida on 15 May 2014.  

Video taken from seat 1A.

Full flight:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3yQMJbcnD6Q

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
